message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase this product. I believe it would be incredibly valuable to you.  I'm asking for $11,000. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $9,500 is a tempting offer, I know the true value of this product.  Would you consider $10,500?
I understand your perspective, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $10,000. Would you be willing to meet me at $9,800?
